Subject: Re: The Great Battle

::Enertron's Spark::
    He needed a body.  Purely by chance he stumbled upon a dead body in a 
clearing in the woods(Amp).  He possessed the body.  It was now weaponless 
but he could still control his energy.  The body was no longer Amp the spark 
had left the body for the matrix.  He began jogging in place learning to 
control this new body.  He detected Galvatron and Optimus fighting on his 
scanners.  "This will be worth while.  There will be a matrix without a body 
after this battle."  He runs towards the battle.  He quickly decides not to 
interfere.
